thread.title: Epic Games gives another action RPG game today
thread.title_full: Epic Games gives another action RPG game today

author: Ömer
title: Epic Games gives another action RPG game today
text: Epic Games Store continues to make certain games free every day as part of its holiday sales. In this context, Epic Games, which has made many productions from indie productions to big budget games available, announced the December 28 free game. Epic Games Store free games (December 28) Cat Quest, an action RPG, is currently available for free on the Epic Games Store. Dubbed “Diablo the Cat” and released in 2017, Cat Quest is about players controlling a cat. Developed by Gentlebros, it will be free until December 29, 19.00. Featuring real-time combat, dungeon adventures and equipment upgrades, Cat Quest is set in the colorful world of Felingard. From a captured town to helping wizards, there are many details for cats to discover. On the other hand, the game has many different locations such as Bermewda’s Triangle, Furbidden Fields and Pawt City, allowing you to enjoy the RPG pleasure. Epic Games made Cursed to Golf free the other day, which golf lovers should definitely check out. Offering a fun experience with rogue-like elements, the production was offered for free until this evening. Cat Quest, whose normal price is $2,99 can be downloaded for free until December 29. After that date, another game will be offered as part of Christmas gifts. You must follow these steps to get the game for free; - Step: Sign in via the Epic Games Store website or desktop app. - Step: Enter the “Cat Quest” page. - Step: Click the purchase button on the right side. - Step: Wait for the process to complete. So what do you think about this issue? How did you find the game that Epic Games Store made free? Don’t forget to share your opinions with us in the Comments section below.
